data.quote: Coding like poetry should be short and concise
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: We are addicted to our thoughts. We cannot change anything if we cannot change our thinking.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: I don't care what you say to me. I care what you share with me.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: If I can see pain in your eyes then share with me your tears. If I can see joy in your eyes then share with me your smile.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Always be fearless. Walk like lion, talk like pigeons, live like elephants and love like an infant child.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Trust starts with truth and ends with truth.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Have you ever seen the stars in the night? See them closely, they will tell you, how to be open, how to love and how to shine and twinkle without any differences and jealousy of other stars.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Those people, who hate you, envy your freedom.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: All the problem of women, starts with men. All the problem of men, ends with women.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Friendship is selfless love, care, respect, and honor not a profitable opportunity.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: To love is easy, to be in a relationship is extremely difficult.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: A heart has problems which mind cannot understand.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: I was lost yesterday, I am found today and I will be forgotten tomorrow.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Do not become someone else just because you are hurt. Be who you are & smile, it may solve, all problems you have got.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Her happiness floated like waves of ocean along the coast of her life. She found lyrics of her life in his arms but she never sung her song.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: I was smiling yesterday,I am smiling today and I will smile tomorrow.Simply because life is too short to cry for anything.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Love has no culture, boundaries, race and religion. It is pure and beautiful like early morning sunrise falling in lake.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Never cry because you have mountains of problem in your hands to solve. Always smile because each problems will someday resolve.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: No human should mislead another by promising them something they know to be untrue.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Do what you love, think what you feel and live the way you want.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Nothing shakes the smiling heart.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: If life is a journey then let my soul travel and share your pain.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: See mirror, every time you will miss me and look deeper into your eyes till you will find me.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: My friends are everything without me but I am nothing without my friends.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: If you claim to be a real friend then be real in your soul. If you claim to be fake then be an enemy instead.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Every beginning has an end and every end is a new beginning.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Always be like a water. Float in the times of pain or dance like waves along the wind which touches its surface.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Wake up, Shake up, Make up and Break up; life is all about moving like ant in search of sugar not sand.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: There are two ways to live a life either forget everything or, remember nothing.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: A child fish asks mother fish, 'Mother, why cannot we live on the Earth?' Mother fish replied, 'Dearâ€¦ it is not the place for fish, it is the place for selfish
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: What you had yesterday is only memories; what you will have tomorrow is your dreams and what you will do today, let it be love.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Life is an experiment in which you may fail or succeed. Explore more, expect least.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: You only get one life. Live it to the fullest. All your miseries will be forgiven when you will be dead.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Trust yourself, you will start to trust others.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: By 20, you should be smart. By 30, you should be strong. By 40, you should be rich. By 50, you should be wise. But if you are smart, strong, rich and wise, you don't need any age limits.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Love is ______ (fill in the blank yourself).
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: It is when things are at worst you will get the best.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Born to be wild; born to be free; nobody owns you; you are, a romantic tree.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: All our wisdom is stored in the trees.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: A strong gives forgiveness but weak gives permission.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Every single desire can lead to dream and every single dream has possibility to become reality.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: It does not matter where you go and what you study, what matters most is what you share with yourself and the world.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Enjoy every bit of your life to the fullest. Your compromises and sacrifices will be rewarded.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: I am the sun who will bring delight when you are in-front of me. I am the moon who will show shyness when you are away from me.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Nothing remains forever, only thing that remain forever is romantically stupid word forever.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Earth is sad, Moon is shy, Sun is happy but wait a moment, I just forgot to tell you that I am the child of open sky.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar

data.quote: Sometimes, I cannot control myself. Please do not blame me, its not me. Maybe it is someone who knows better about me.
data.author: Santosh Kalwar
